message: Let's start fair.  I'll take 90% and you can have 10%.  We can work something out later if you'd like.
You're starting high, I'm starting low. Let's meet in the middle!
Let's be reasonable.  I'm willing to drop my share a bit more, but I need a better deal than 60/40.  How about 72/28?
You dropped your share by 20%, I'll drop mine by 20% too. Meet me in the middle, again!
